description: Creates a new site in a global network.

parameters.name: GlobalNetworkId
parameters.description: The ID of the global network.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: A description of your site. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

parameters.name: Location
parameters.description: The site location. This information is used for visualization in the Network Manager console. If you specify the address, the latitude and longitude are automatically calculated. Address: The physical address of the site. Latitude: The latitude of the site. Longitude: The longitude of the site. Address (string) --- The physical address. Latitude (string) --- The latitude. Longitude (string) --- The longitude.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to apply to the resource during creation. (dict) --- Describes a tag. Key (string) --- The tag key. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters. Value (string) --- The tag value. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The tag key. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The tag value. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

nested_items.name: SiteArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the site.

nested_items.name: GlobalNetworkId
nested_items.description: The ID of the global network.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the site was created.
